outputs.output_descr: LOGSIP has three components: a) Policy and regulatory framework; b) Institutional/Capacity development ; c) Investments and service delivery. The project aims to: a) To contribute towards the operationalisation of the second phase of the National Decentralisation Programme (NDP II); b) To enhance the capacity and effectiveness of all institutions directly implementing NDP II; c) To enhance the capacity of local authorities and their communities in the planning, promotion, and management of LED.
